subject: Re: Older 12-470 on ebay
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Mike, I had an incredible session yesterday with the 12-469 and amped 
speakers.  I have not uploaded the file, yet, but I am ruined.  Great 
questioning and answering...very discernable.  It seems when the 
person operating the device tunes in, the mish mash of audio bits 
become something else when the spirits start using it.

As Halliday said, no box needed with these radios.  The box made it 
difficult to record clearer voices and made things a bit muffled for 
me.  I made an echo chamber and used a sound chamber, but didn't like 
it as well.  The amplified speakers seem to give a nice "hiss" which 
fills in the gaps with white noise (?), but that hiss makes it 
difficult for clarity when dropped in a chamber. 

Now I am excited to use the 12-470 (older version) without the 
chambers and with (just to compare, as well).

LC
http://www.AngelsGhosts.com



--- In EVP-ITC@...m, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> Ahhh... Welcome to the world of 12-470 (older version) ownership.  
I 
> think you will find it a bit better than the 12-469, in my opinion 
> anyway.  I guess since I own both models... I can say that after a 
> side by side comparison.  You can say goodbye to that AM sweep 
> clicking found on the 12-469, anyway.
> 
> Enjoy your new experimental device... once it arrives!
> 
> - Mike
>

> >
